title: Married But Available
overview: After experiencing a near-death situation, young couple Au Yeung Chi Chung and Chu Ming Ming hastily get married while vacationing abroad. As fate will have it, they end up working at the same company when they return to Hong Kong. Ming Ming's boss, Sze Lo Ga, had a hurtful relationship with ex-husband Cheung Kin Kwok, causing her to despise marriage and devote all her time to work. She offers Ming Ming a high salary to become her personal assistant. Hoping to improve her life, Ming Ming chooses to conceal her marriage. Chi Chung reluctantly cooperates and must be careful at every step. On one hand, he is loyal to his boss and good friend Cheung Jin Bok, who is Lo Ga's rival. On the other hand, he must stay silent even as he watches Jin Bok pursuing Ming Ming. When Chi Chung re-encounters his childhood friend Gei Man Yee, his fragile soul cannot withstand her unconditional love. They have a dreamy romance, until Chi Chung shockingly discovers that Man Yee is Jin Bok's sister, making this complicated battle for love even more intense...
